snippet: James J. Florio, a former Democratic governor of New Jersey, responds to a column by Thomas L. Friedman.
abstract: Letter from former New Jersey Gov James J Florio comments on Thomas L Friedman Nov 10 Op-Ed column expressing his support for the health care reform law.
lead_paragraph: James J. Florio, a former Democratic governor of New Jersey, responds to a column by Thomas L. Friedman.
